function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased frequency of garden usage may lead to higher contact and potential spread of contagious diseases in shared spaces.","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of infectious diseases within the community.","Mitigation":"Encourage social distancing and hygiene practices while using shared garden spaces, and limit the number of people in the garden at the same time.","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for booking garden time slots and monitoring capacity.","People":"Residents with access to shared gardens or allotments.","Owner":"Community organizations or local authorities."},{"Description":"Anxiety about COVID-19 may impact mental health and increase susceptibility to stress-related illnesses.","Impact":"Potential decline in mental and emotional wellbeing for individuals experiencing anxiety about COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support services and promote stress management techniques.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for remote counseling and mental health support.","People":"Individuals experiencing anxiety about COVID-19.","Owner":"Healthcare providers and mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Increased outdoor activities, such as gardening, may lead to higher physical activity levels and improved overall wellbeing.","Impact":"Potential improvement in physical and emotional health for individuals engaging in gardening and outdoor activities.","Mitigation":"Promote physical activity guidelines and provide educational resources for safe gardening practices.","Technologies":"Online gardening communities and virtual workshops for gardening enthusiasts.","People":"Individuals engaging in gardening and outdoor activities.","Owner":"Public health agencies and gardening associations."}]}
